ygData.subject: Re: Thex Mallet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... need to be 20th level to get this weapon, but when you finally do, it sucks. The only reason I would see anyone wanting this at level 20 is for putting in
ygData.messageBody:
> This is an example of how messed up some of the quests in EQ are. You
need to be 20th level to get this weapon, but when you finally do, it sucks.
The only reason I would see anyone wanting this at level 20 is for putting
in your range slot for the +5 Magic resistence. My 9th level cleric can
summon a weapon that has superior attack stats to this piece of ****.

Scragg, you're missing the big picture. The Thex Mallet is not the END of a
quest, just part of the MEANS. What I mean by this is that the Thex Mallet
gets turned in to an NPC for a Ring of the Dead (the ring that lets us SKs
BIND). You're right, the Mallet sucks, and that's because it is only PART of
a quest, it isn't meant for actual use.

Dravith
